author: KIM TONG-HYUNG
title: S. Korea approves Pfizer's COVID vaccine for ages 5-11
description: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — South Korean health officials on Wednesday approved Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine for children aged 5 to 11, expanding the country's immunization program in the face of a massive omicron outbreak that is driving up hospitalizations and d…
